items.title: Taxability of Earnings
items.headline: Handling different types of income for tax purposes
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn how to handle different types of income for tax purposes and how to enter them in tax preparation software. The objectives of the course are listed below.  1.     Learn how to handle wages, salaries, and tips.  2.     Learn how to complete Schedule B for interest, dividends, and foreign account and trust questions.  3.     Learn about the taxability of retirement income.  4. Review ROTH IRA recharacterization rules and Alimony requirements.  5. Walk through entering the information on all of the above in tax preparation software.
